title.narrative: Foreign Policy Association Enhancing the role of local authorities and media in implementing the Law on Ensuring Equality

description.narrative: The Law on Ensuring Equality entered into force on 1st of January 2013 in the Republic of Moldova yetits implementation is endangered by lack of clear understanding and awareness in the Moldovan societyabout the meaning and extent of the discrimination phe nomenon as well as about the existingprotection and safeguard mechanisms that citizens can use to defend their rights. Thus the key purposeof the current project is to raise Moldovan society's awareness on the need to prevent and combatdiscrimination pheno menon as well as to break its stereotypes about the Law on Ensuring Equalitythrough unbiased and fair information of the local authorities regional mass-media and local civilsociety organizations about the real content of the law its opportunities and impl ementationmechanisms.The aim of the project is to help local authorities and journalists to understand and assume their part ofresponsibility in eliminating various forms of discrimination. Therefore Foreign Policy Association(APE) will undertake 20 traini ngs on implementing the Law on Ensuring Equality for local authoritiesand regional journalists. It also will publish anti-discrimination information materials in the local pressof 20 regional centers. The trainings will be organized in partnership with the National Council forpreventing + combating discrimination.
